summary: WINDOWS ON BOTH DRIVERS SIDE AND PASSENGER SIDE, THROUGHOUT THE VEHICLE WILL CEASE TO FUNCTION. THE SIDE MIRRORS WILL ALSO NOT FUNCTION. WHEN YOU TRY, THEY DON'T WORK AND ALSO LIGHT UP THE DASH BOARD LIGHTS ( LOW TIRE, CHECK ENGINE, ETC. ALL IDIOT LIGHTS. THIS CAN ALL BE GOING ON IN ALL MODES. PARKED DRIVING DAY OR NIGHT.   IT ALL STARTED ON THE DATE BELOW.  IT STILL EXISTS TO THIS DAY
